title: Seeing a baby chair in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: There is no doubt that seeing a child’s stool in a dream can also bring a kind of disgust, but in reality it carries many connotations, as it can be a sign of good and it can be a harbinger of evil. Seeing a child’s stool in a dream for a married womanWhen a married woman sees stool A child in her dream, this can be a clear indication of blessing and goodness in general. It also indicates the stability of her family and the multiple sources of her livelihood. If a married woman sees in a dream the child’s feces on her bed, it may be on him. It indicates her desire to mingle with her husband, but he is far away from her. It may indicate some kind of distress or that she is sick, and God knows best. Also, if a married woman sees in her dream the feces of a child and is waiting for pregnancy, this is news of the approaching pregnancy. If a married woman sees the feces of a child in her dream and there is some of it on the bed. This may mean the end of her problems. Marriage, God willing. When a married woman sees a child’s feces in her dream, this is clear evidence for her. This diet comes to her quickly because it shows a lot of money and a lot of goodness. If a married woman sees a child’s feces in her dream, this may indicate that she will give birth to a new child. In the event that she knows about the child, this indicates that she has obtained money and will improve her life for what is best for her and her family. In the event that a married woman sees a child’s chair in her dream and steps on it with her foot, it could mean that he has a desire to do something or that he is waiting for it to be done. When a married woman dreams of a child excreting during her sleep, this is a sign. Because of the duties and responsibilities that he has to carry out and perform without complaint. Interpretation of seeing feces in general in a dream for a married womanWhen a married woman sees feces in her dream, it may mean that she collects a lot of food. And she gains A lot of money in the coming period. If a married woman sees in her dream that she cannot defecate, this may be the case. It is an indication that she has overcome the problems and obstacles she faces in life. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is defecating, this is evidence of that. She can get rid of All the problems and crises that he suffered before. If a married woman sees that there is some feces in her bed, this may mean that. The affection, appreciation, and love that she feels through her marital relationship. When a married woman sees feces in her dream, this is evidence of sustenance and abundance of money. If a married woman sees feces in large quantities in her dream, this indicates the approaching date of her pregnancy. Also, if a child’s feces are seen in a married woman’s dream, this may indicate good news of an imminent pregnancy, God willing. If a married woman sees her infant son’s feces, this is evidence of abundance. Goodness. If a married woman sees that she is collecting feces in a bowl, this indicates that her life is stable and happy. See also: Interpretation of seeing a chair in a dream in detail. title: Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: But this does not prevent it from having a meaning in the fortuneteller’s dream, which often brings goodness and blessings, and it is known that the interpretation of a dream about eggs varies from one person to another and according to the situation in. Which it is, and since we found that interpreters consider this dream a praiseworthy vision. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a married womanIt is said that seeing eggs in a dream for a married woman. It may be evidence that God Almighty will bless her with a lot of money. It is said that seeing eggs in a dream For a married woman and her husband, it bodes well. This may be a sign that her husband will achieve great success at work and will also bring him a great financial return. Also, dreaming of eggs in a dream for a married woman and breaking them means that she is pregnant. There are some problems and fights between her and her husband, so she must be careful. This vision indicates A dream about eggs in a dream about a married woman. Soon she will become pregnant with a child, God willing. Also, the dream of eggs in a dream symbolizes a married woman who has been boiled. She will become pregnant with a girl if the size of the dream is unknown. Commentators said that seeing eggs in a dream is for a married woman and she was buying them. This may be evidence that God Almighty will bless her with many daughters and sons. It is said that seeing eggs in a dream for a married woman is rude. This indicates that she will waste her husband’s money buying useless things, and therefore she needs to change herself. Commentators said that Seeing eggs in a dream was for a married woman and their number was many. It may be a sign that he will earn a large sum of money from working in trade. Likewise, seeing eggs in a dream was for a married woman and their number was many. This may be evidence that she lives a life full of stability. And happiness with her husband. As the commentators mentioned The dream of buying eggs in a dream is for a married woman. It could be a sign that she is always working to organize and organize all her responsibilities and duties towards her family. Seeing the dream of buying eggs for a married woman in a dream means. She is living a stable and happy married life with her husband and children. It is said that dreaming of buying Eggs in a married woman’s dream. It can show how strong the relationship between her family members is and how they protect each other. It also symbolizes seeing a dream about buying eggs in a dream for a married woman and they were in large quantities. It can be evidence that the husband has good relations with his children and also shows that the love that unites them. title: Interpretation of a dream about grilling meat: Seeing roasting in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A vision of grilling chicken and grilled meat in a dream of a single, married, pregnant girl over charcoal grilling kebabs and eating barbecue. I dreamed that I was grilling meat. Grilling in a dream is life news, and if it is immature, it is a source of worry. And roasted lamb means a lot of money, and if it is lean, then it is little money and the food is tiring. Whoever eats a roasted lamb will eat his son’s income. Grilling cows is safe for a fearful person, even if he has a wife who is pregnant with a male child. Grilling veal is for nourishment and fertility. A roasted kid indicates the boy who ate it. Everything that is exposed to fire while awake is wrong food in the dream. The roasted camel is a male boy, and he is safe from fear, or he is a gentle boy, and whoever sees that the camel’s arm on the grill is talking to him, he will be saved from death. Grilled or cooked bird meat means saving money without treachery or treachery. The grilled side is referred to as the woman because Eve was created from the side of Adam, peace be upon them both. A ripe roasted arm is a conspiracy against a woman, but if it is immature, it is a misdemeanor. Everyone who buys a piece of barbecue hires a worker. It was said: Bread is protection, sadness, or forbidden money. Whoever sees that he is roasting a ram or a sick person, or that the Sultan tortures him or imprisons him. Whoever roasts a sheep, his wife or mother will become ill, and whoever roasts a goat, his son, or his servant will contract smallpox. Perhaps roasting is good news of deliverance from distress and victory over enemies. If the roast is a calf, and if it is a camel, then it is honor and joys, health from illness, the marriage of single people, and the arrival of the traveler. Perhaps interrogation indicates betrayal, theft of grace, imprisonment, and plundering of money. The grilled is interpreted by a writer, and it was said that the grilled is a man because of whom people live in prosperity. Whoever dreams that he is grilling a ram, he will fall ill or the sultan will afflict him with torment and sorrow. A dream of roasting lamb indicates that you eat money with fatigue, and beef indicates safety. In that year, lamb and mutton. Seeing a barbecue in a dream is good news for a good life, and seeing grilled lamb in a dream indicates a lot of money, and if the grilled lamb in the dream is lean, then it is a diet in which, fatigue and little money. Whoever takes his son, seeing cows on hot coals in a dream is safe for the fearful, and if the dreamer has a pregnant woman, she will give birth to a child, and whoever sees roasted beef in a dream, it means fertility, pleasant male food, and the dreamer has safety. From fear. And whoever sees in a dream that a camel on the grill is speaking to him in a dream, he will be saved from destruction. Seeing bird meat cooked or grilled indicates saving money without treachery or fatigue, and seeing the side of the grill indicates a woman, just as Eve was created from the side of Adam, peace be upon them. And whoever sees in In a dream, he bought a piece of barbecue, then he hires a worker, and roasting a calf in a dream may be good news of victory over enemies or relief from distress, and if the roast is a camel, then this indicates glory and joy for the recovery of a sick person from travel or the marriage of an unmarried person. Seeing a barbecue in a dream is considered a harbinger. For a good life, especially if it is fresh. A fat sheep in a dream is money, and a skinny sheep is food with fatigue. Grilling cows in a dream is safe for the fearful, for the male boy.

title: Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream is one of the dreams that has many connotations. In general, darkness is always a source of mystery and a feeling of dread, and people are always worried about dark places, and darkness is actually an obstacle to achieving many things. Do not accept any interpretation that we provide and present with any other vision, even if there is a similarity between the two visions, because you must know that the interpretation of dreams depends on many factors and is not limited only to the details of the vision for you. Saw. Read also: Palaces and the fruits of paradise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream. The dream interpretation scholar Ibn Sirin says that darkness in a dream indicates many negative meanings such as alienation, loneliness, and loss. Ibn Sirin also says that darkness in a dream shows the psychological state of the opinion. Just as darkness in a dream can express the priest’s fears about the future. As for a person who sees himself in a dream walking down a dark road, this indicates that the opinion suffers from feelings of loneliness and insecurity. Just like walking down a dark road, this dream may indicate To the abandonment of friends, and God knows best. Read also: The toilet in a dream. Seeing darkness in a dream for a man. A person who sees himself in a dream walking in darkness, this indicates that this man is far from religion and does not keep the commandments of God - the Almighty - and this dream is a harbinger for him and a message until he returns to God. Seeing darkness in a single woman’s dream. An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is walking on a dark road, even though the road seems familiar to her, this dream indicates that there is an ambition for this girl, but she does not have the ability to achieve it as a result. From the presence of some emotional states or blood in this girl’s life. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream Seeing darkness in a dream for a married woman A married woman sees in a dream that her kitchen is dark, this may be an indication that she is going through a financial crisis, and God knows best. Also, if a married woman sees her bedroom Dark in a dream, this means that there are some worries and problems that the woman is suffering from, and this dream could be a sign of problems with the husband, and God knows best. In addition to the married woman seeing a ray of light in the dream, this indicates that the crises that the girl is going through are just a general matter. Passing by. Seeing darkness in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees in a dream that she is walking in a Muslim place, this indicates the fear and anxiety that this woman suffers from due to childbirth. As for the pregnant woman who sees light in a dream from afar, this may be a man for her - if God willing - for an easy and natural birth. Read also: Penguin in a dream. I see a walk at night with someone I know in a dream. If you dream that you are walking with someone in the dark, this may be a sign of suffering, loneliness, and distraction that the opinion suffers from, and God knows best. This vision can also indicate To the difficulties and trials that the opinion suffers from. In addition to walking in the dark with someone who loves the opinion, this may be an indication that the opinion will be strong.

title: Interpretation of seeing a dream about laughter in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFansInterpretation of seeing a dream about laughter in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Laughter can be an expression of happiness and joy, it can be an expression of sarcasm, and it can be one of the ways to overcome feelings of sadness and fear. Laughter in a dream has many interpretations that differ depending on the dream, and in this article we will provide you with all possible interpretations of seeing laughter in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Al-Nabulsi laughing in a dream. Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing laughter in a dream as evidence of joy and happiness, especially if it is without laughter. And seeing loud laughter is Falling to the ground is a dream that is contrary to reality, because it expresses great sadness, grief, and tears. Al-Nabulsi said, “See, laughter is caused by sarcasm or sarcasm, as this is evidence of the dreamer’s lack of modesty and that he is a person who jokes a lot in reality. Considering laughter as a means of imitation and imitation is evidence of falling into taboos and prohibitions.” Single Whoever sees in a dream that he is laughing quietly without laughing, this is evidence that he is close to marriage. And the pregnant woman who sees in a dream that she is laughing quietly without laughing, then this dream is evidence that the baby is a boy, and God knows best. Seeing a smile in a dream And whoever sees in a dream that he is smiling With a calm and light smile, this is evidence of Saladin and the world. Whoever sees the earth laughing in a dream, this is evidence of the fertility of that place. And he laughs or smiles in the dream. This dream deserves praise for the Manufi and is evidence that he will reside in the abode of bliss in the afterlife. The sultan or the person of prestige who sees in a dream that he is laughing lightly or trivially in a dream, this dream is not recommended for the dreamer, because it is evidence of the loss of his blessing, dominion, and authority. Interpretation of the vision of laughter for single women. An unmarried woman who sees in a dream that she is laughing, this dream is good for the dreamer, and is evidence of joy and happiness, especially if it is without laughter or sarcasm and ridicule, and laughter in a dream can be for single people. A sign of close marriage. And whoever sees in her dream that she is laughing because of the mockery of a poor man, a beggar, or an old man, then this is evidence of her weakness in faith and her distance from the teachings of religion. Laughter in a lonely person’s dream is good and indicates happiness and joy, especially if he is humble and generous, or laughing in a place It is allowed to laugh like the theater. And we see laughing with friends and in the company of loved ones, this dream is evidence of the joy that will dominate the dreaming partners in the future. Laughing in a dream for an unmarried woman can be evidence that she lives a stable life and has balance in her personality, and it can be a sign of a stressful situation. Negative is about to disappear. Interpretation of seeing laughter in a married woman’s dream: A married woman sees in a dream that she is laughing with a quiet laugh, then this dream is a good and happy sign for the dreamer. And whoever sees in a dream that she is laughing humbly, away from people’s eyes, this is good news that God will give her a righteous son. In general, silent laughter in a married woman’s dream is a sign of pregnancy, a child, nourishment, happiness and joy. And whoever sees himself laughing in the mosque or in the prayer hall, this dream is not good.

And seeing loud laughter is Falling to the ground is a dream that is contrary to reality, because it expresses great sadness, grief, and tears. Al-Nabulsi said, “See, laughter is caused by sarcasm or sarcasm, as this is evidence of the dreamer’s lack of modesty and that he is a person who jokes a lot in reality. Considering laughter as a means of imitation and imitation is evidence of falling into taboos and prohibitions.” Single Whoever sees in a dream that he is laughing quietly without laughing, this is evidence that he is close to marriage. And the pregnant woman who sees in a dream that she is laughing quietly without laughing, then this dream is evidence that the baby is a boy, and God knows best. Seeing a smile in a dream And whoever sees in a dream that he is smiling With a calm and light smile, this is evidence of Saladin and the world. Whoever sees the earth laughing in a dream, this is evidence of the fertility of that place. And he laughs or smiles in the dream. This dream deserves praise for the Manufi and is evidence that he will reside in the abode of bliss in the afterlife. The sultan or the person of prestige who sees in a dream that he is laughing lightly or trivially in a dream, this dream is not recommended for the dreamer, because it is evidence of the loss of his blessing, dominion, and authority. Interpretation of the vision of laughter for single women. An unmarried woman who sees in a dream that she is laughing, this dream is good for the dreamer, and is evidence of joy and happiness, especially if it is without laughter or sarcasm and ridicule, and laughter in a dream can be for single people. A sign of close marriage. And whoever sees in her dream that she is laughing because of the mockery of a poor man, a beggar, or an old man, then this is evidence of her weakness in faith and her distance from the teachings of religion. Laughter in a lonely person’s dream is good and indicates happiness and joy, especially if he is humble and generous, or laughing in a place It is allowed to laugh like the theater. And we see laughing with friends and in the company of loved ones, this dream is evidence of the joy that will dominate the dreaming partners in the future. Laughing in a dream for an unmarried woman can be evidence that she lives a stable life and has balance in her personality, and it can be a sign of a stressful situation. Negative is about to disappear. Interpretation of seeing laughter in a married woman’s dream: A married woman sees in a dream that she is laughing with a quiet laugh, then this dream is a good and happy sign for the dreamer. And whoever sees in a dream that she is laughing humbly, away from people’s eyes, this is good news that God will give her a righteous son. In general, silent laughter in a married woman’s dream is a sign of pregnancy, a child, nourishment, happiness and joy. And whoever sees himself laughing in the mosque or in the prayer hall, this dream is not good.

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing the president in a dream

preview.html: The appearance of the president in a dream and the interpretation of his vision: The president is a person of the country who manages all the internal and external affairs of the state, works for the comfort of its citizens and contributes to the maximum extent to the country’s progress and development. To appear worthy of her appearance befitting her family. Seeing the President of the Republic in a dream When the dreamer sees in a dream the President of the Republic shaking hands with each other, this is evidence that the dreamer has many goals that he seeks to achieve and that the vision is good news for him that achieving these goals is approaching and approaching. The doors, and the smile of the President of the Republic on the viewer’s face indicates good luck for him, the end of anxiety and freedom from depression. When an unmarried woman sees that she is afraid to see the President of the Republic in a dream, and in her dream she was sitting next to him and was afraid, this is evidence that the unmarried woman feels fear of the unknown, And you feel worried about it. Her future, but God will help her pave the right path for her so that her future will flourish soon. When a divorced woman sees that the president passed in front of her in a dream and tried to prevent him from speaking to him, and she actually succeeded, this is evidence that there are some difficult goals in her life that she is trying to achieve and is doing so. All she can. So you get what you want and you get there. Because the vision made it clear. When a young child sees that he is sitting next to the President of the Republic and there is a dialogue between them full of laughter and joy, this is evidence that this child was not an ordinary person in the future, but rather he will be an ordinary person. He is an official and has a high status, as the vision made clear. A divorced woman saw that her ex-husband was a leader in a dream, and she was astonished by the situation. How did he reach this position? This vision confirms that she is still thinking about him, loves him, and wants to return to live with him again. Seeing the President of the Republic in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin confirmed that displaying the president’s face in a dream is evidence of the happiness that will be the dreamer’s share in all aspects of his life. But if he sees the president angry in a dream Or screaming and chanting out of intense anger, this is evidence of many sorrows and worries that will accumulate on the dreamer in the coming period and rob him of his sense of life and beauty. When the dreamer sees in a dream that the leader of his country is crying or very sad, this is evidence that the dreamer is deviating in worship and God is not giving. His right. One of the visions in which the dreamer is surprised is to see him prostrating in fear in front of the president inside his palace. This is evidence that the dreamer will soon repent to God and be forgiven. But if the dreamer is a man who knows God’s way and follows it with absolute precision, then this vision confirms that he will reach a great position in the future. What is the interpretation of the president’s dream of seeing single women? You still cannot find an interpretation. For your dream? Go to Google and search for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. One of the praiseworthy visions for a single woman is her vision of the head of state. Because it suggests many interpretations, especially if an unmarried woman sees that the head of state is present inside the house in which she lives and is walking around, this is evidence that God will grant that person blessing and happiness in her life, h

title: Interpretation of a dream about skin of a dog

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the skin of a dog in a dream. We may find that some people are looking for an interpretation of a dream about a dog scratching in a dream, and it is one of the dreams that some people see, but there are many interpretations provided by the site. It clarifies, citing the interpretations of some working scholars who are trying to reach the truth. Interpretation of a dream The skin of a dog in a dream: Whoever dreams that he is being slaughtered and loses his word may indicate his victory over an enemy he was dealing with in those days. If the skin of dogs is visualized in the dream, this may indicate positive changes occurring in the life of the dreamer during this period. Whoever sees in his dream that he Skinning a dog may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life and the acquisition of many rights. Seeing a slaughtered and skinned dog in a dream can indicate that you are revealing the truth and getting rid of falsehood with the grace of God. Interpretation of a dream about resisting dogs in a dream Seeing a dog resisting in a dream can indicate Struggle against the problem that the dreamer falls into on those days, and God knows best. In the event that a person sees that he is resisting dogs, this may indicate his ability to achieve goals and ambitions during those days. If you see a dog attacking a person while doing so, this may indicate good changes occur in his life during this time. If one sees a dog resisting in a dream, this may indicate good changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about dogs running after me in a dream: Anyone who dreams that dogs are chasing and attacking him can indicate The presence of an actor trying to destroy his reputation. Dreaming of dogs chasing the visionary in the dream could indicate that a problem remains that the owner of the vision was big. If one sees that dogs are jumping on him, this may indicate that his enemies are surrounding him, and he should ask God for help. In If you see dogs chasing a person in a dream, this may be an indication of feeling sad and sad at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about dogs inside the house in a dream: If you see a group of dogs around the house, this may indicate evil that may be approaching the people of the house and they must be prevented. A dream about the presence of ugly dogs inside the house in a dream may indicate that there are people who are not well in their lives at that time and they must ask God for help. Anyone who dreams that a dog was inside the house in a dream may indicate changes occurring among the people of the house, so he should ask for help from God. If you see dogs inside the house in a dream, this may indicate the presence of a corrupt person and you must stay away from him, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a dog in a dream: Slaughtering a dog and eating its meat may indicate that there are many goals that one desires to achieve. If one sees... If he dreams that he is slaughtering a dog, this may indicate that he has overcome a major problem that he was facing at that time. In the event that a person sees that he is slaughtering a dog in a dream, this may be a sign of positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period. Whoever saw in If he dreams that he is slaughtering a dog in a dream, it may indicate hearing good news in those days, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a dream about escaping from prison

preview.html: From this we conclude the interpretations of this vision for different people in a dream, whether women or men, of different social status, which we will explain to you in this article, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream of escaping from prison in a dream Whoever sees in a dream that he is released from prison after being acquitted. This is evidence that his problems will be solved soon, God willing. When someone sees that he breaks the chains and breaks the prison door to escape from prison. It is evidence that the fortuneteller is able to get rid of worries. With his patience and determination, he is able to achieve all his goals and desires. In the event that someone sees that he is escaping from prison but there are dogs chasing him. It is evidence that the haters will cause him a lot of trouble. If he manages to escape from the dogs. This is evidence of his distancing from their hatred and envy, God willing. Escaping from prison expresses the dreamer's ability to eliminate desires. Liberation from evil lusts. Seeing someone escaping from prison. Expression of the dreamer getting rid of the various mistakes he has committed. Turning to the path of guidance and staying away from the paths of evil. Interpretation of seeing escaping from prison by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says Escape from prison in a dream. Expression of the dreamer's desire to overcome the problems and fears he is going through. The dreamer who dreams of escaping from prison and is chased by dogs. Expression of envy. The dreamer sees that he is escaping from inside the prison. Expression of the dreamer's abstention from committing any sin that angers God Almighty. If he sees dogs, the owner dreams. Expression that the dreamer has already committed many sins. See also: Interpretation of a dream of prison for a married woman Interpretation of a dream of escaping from prison for freemen An unmarried woman who dreams of escaping from prison. Expression that she will be able to end her problems with the least possible loss. Seeing escaping from prison in a single woman's dream and then going to prison again. Evidence that she will marry a righteous person, and that too after severe suffering. Seeing single women escaping from prison. Evidence that she has many customs that are completely different from the customs and traditions of society. An unmarried woman when she dreams that someone is chasing her, but she escapes from prison. There are indications in her dream that someone wants to harm her. He is close to her, so she must be careful. Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream for a woman Single An unmarried girl who dreams of going to prison. It is an expression of her marriage to a person of high and high status. And she will be happy with this marriage. When a girl sees someone going to prison and this person is unknown to her. It is an expression that someone will try to deceive her. But he will be able to discover the fraud. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream someone crying inside the prison walls. It is an expression of the problems that you will face and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing prison in a dream for a married woman Married when she sees prison in a dream. It is an expression of her illness and that she will soon recover from this illness, God willing. If a married woman dreams that she enters prison and then leaves it. It is an expression of her ability to pay off her debt. This is after she suffered from a huge financial crisis in the past period. About

title: Interpretation of dreams and visions of salt in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams and visions of salt in a dream This is one of the dreams that many dream interpretation scholars believe is very praiseworthy. We will learn about some interpretations of some visions in which salt appears to single, married, and pregnant men and women, with the need to remember that these interpretations are visions interpreted after determining the person’s circumstances. The owner of the vision, therefore, it is not wise to impose interpretations of these visions on any vision of any person, regardless of the connection between this vision and the interpretation to be presented, as it is better to review it by trusted interpretation scholars with an explanation of all the circumstances to make the correct interpretation of the vision. Interpretation of the vision of salt. In a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, there is good news of happiness and goodness that the dreamer possesses, and God knows best. While the interpretation of a dream about seeing salt for a single woman may indicate the imminent date of her marriage to a good person. As for the interpretation of a dream about salt, it is placed on the body of the dreamer. It is a harbinger of problems or family disputes and financial loss. Interpretation of seeing salt In a dream for a man, it portends good tidings, kindness, and joy awaiting the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams and visions of salt in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted this vision according to the situation after seeing the vision as follows: Ibn Sirin believes that dreaming of giving another person salt in a dream indicates MoneyGod knows best. Just like the interpretation of dreams and visions of salt in a dream and sprinkling salt on the ground in a dream, this indicates asceticism in this world. In addition to dreaming of eating salt or dreaming of buying salt, this indicates the abundant wealth that a person will acquire, God willing. If a man sees Salt on his body in a dream, this is a sign of exhaustion. God knows best. As for seeing salt in a dream in a pale color, this indicates sadness and sorrow. Seeing salt in a dream about Nabulsi Some of Nabulsi’s interpretations of this dream were as follows: Al-Nabulsi says that a dream about salt indicates money that the dreamer will acquire without... Suffering, agony, or effort, God knows best. Also, the interpretation of salty dreams and visions in a dream indicates reconciliation between quarrels, God willing. As for spoiled salt in a dream, this vision indicates injustice or that the country will be affected by the plague. Seeing salt in a dream is for a married woman, and among the interpretations of a married woman who sees Salt in her dream is as follows: A married woman’s dream of pouring salt in the house foretells the abundance of money that she will obtain soon, God willing. Just like seeing salt on the bed, this foretells for a married woman that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. God knows best. Salt for a married woman expresses the great comfort and happiness that She feels it between her and her husband. In addition, seeing the house filled with salt indicates the importance of always playing the Qur’an in the house and the house that is fortified. Seeing salt in a divorced woman’s dream Seeing salt in a divorced woman’s dream has many interpretations as suggested by the leading interpretation scholars. We will learn about Some of them are as follows: For a divorced woman, seeing salt in a dream is a sign of problems that arise
